about_the_game:
During a fateful encounter one day, Ritsu meets Lily, a magical being from a far away world, and they strike a deal, one which has the potential to put Ritsu’s life back on track… Or to derail it even further. In exchange for healing her leg injury, which had cost Ritsu her place within the prestigious Furumiya Academy track team, she has agreed to become Lily’s champion and fight evil as a magical girl! Join them as the duo face down evil in the form of mysterious monsters and those who seek to unleash them! 

Along the way, they will have to contend with a corrupt Student Council that gleefully uses its power to satisfy their darkest desires, and a shady corporate pharmaceutical empire operating in the shadows that controls both Furumiya Academy and the very town of Shinmachi!

Take on enemies on the field in a classic turn based combat system. The enemies will try to bind, poison, or stun Ritsu in an effort to get their villainous hands on her, so you'll have to stay on your toes and develop different strategies to deal with all of them!

  • Skill Trees: An extensive selection of skills allow you to customize Ritsu’s fighting style to your liking. Will you develop Lily into a physical fighter who seeks justice with her trusty fists, or will she wield her newfound magical powers to vanquish her foes? The choice is yours to make!

  • Field Exploration: Explore the sprawling world to discover events and resources to craft items and develop Ritsu’s skills and powers to better face her foes!

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains instances of strong language.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1800 MB available space

short_description: Go on a journey with Ritsu and Lily to uncover the secrets behind the Kuzono Group, a shady pharmaceutical corporation with nefarious plans. Join Ritsu as she uses Lily's power to transform into a magical girl to take on supernatural enemies in this thrilling adventure!
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
